product_name: Moving Comfort Fearless Pants - Women's Regular - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's easygoing Fearless Pants from Moving Comfort in a regular length are quintessential studio pants, renowned for their great fit and soft fabric. You'll love them for mat work and more. Polyester/spandex fabric wicks moisture, dries fast and offers UPF 50+. Lined gusset and chafe-free seams add comfort. Wide Powermesh waistband slims and stays put, and has a hidden pocket. Moving Comfort Fearless Pants in women's regular length are semifitted. Closeout.
short_description: The women's easygoing Fearless Pants from Moving Comfort in a regular length are quintessential studio pants, renowned for their great fit and soft fabric. You'll love them for mat work and more.
